steps.title: Draw a circle for the head and a small circle on the lower left for the snout.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the head and a small circle on the lower left for the snout.

steps.title: Draw two large and erect ears.
steps.content: Draw two large and erect ears.

steps.title: Draw the Chihuahua’s body using two circles connected by curved shapes.
steps.content: Draw the Chihuahua’s body using two circles connected by curved shapes.

steps.title: Draw the legs attached to the body.
steps.content: Draw the legs attached to the body.

steps.title: Draw the tail that curves over the back.
steps.content: Draw the tail that curves over the back.

steps.title: Draw details on the face, starting with the big dark expressive eyes and small curved strokes to show wrinkled skin on the forehead and around the eyes.
steps.content: Draw details on the face, starting with the big dark expressive eyes and small curved strokes to show wrinkled skin on the forehead and around the eyes.

steps.title: Draw the details on the snout and nose.
steps.content: Draw the details on the snout and nose.

steps.title: Trace the head shape and add short slanted strokes to represent the fur.
steps.content: Trace the head shape and add short slanted strokes to represent the fur.

steps.title: Do the same for the rest of the Chihuahua’s body.
steps.content: Do the same for the rest of the Chihuahua’s body.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Colour your drawing.
steps.content: Colour your drawing.

steps.title: Draw a circle for the head and a small circle on the lower right portion for the snout.
steps.content: Draw a circle for the head and a small circle on the lower right portion for the snout.

steps.title: Draw two large and erect ears.
steps.content: Draw two large and erect ears.

steps.title: Below the head, draw two curved lines for the neck and body.
steps.content: Below the head, draw two curved lines for the neck and body.

steps.title: Draw the legs.
steps.content: Draw the legs.

steps.title: Draw a crescent shape on the hind part on the Chihuahua’s body for the tail.
steps.content: Draw a crescent shape on the hind part on the Chihuahua’s body for the tail.

steps.title: Draw large eyes and add small strokes around it to make the face look wrinkled.
steps.content: Draw large eyes and add small strokes around it to make the face look wrinkled.

steps.title: Draw the details on the snout and nose.
steps.content: Draw the details on the snout and nose.

steps.title: Add finer details to the head and you can also add accessories like a collar.
steps.content: Add finer details to the head and you can also add accessories like a collar.

steps.title: Draw the rest of the body.
steps.content: Draw the rest of the body.

steps.title: Erase unnecessary lines.
steps.content: Erase unnecessary lines.

steps.title: Colour your drawing.
steps.content: Colour your drawing.
